chunk:
ATTITUDE Oceanly Phyto-Oil Face Oil

Brand: ATTITUDE

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Ingredients: Vitis vinifera (grape) seed oil, isopropyl palmitate, isostearyl isostearate, helianthus annuus (sunflower) seed wax, octyldodecanol, helianthus annuus (sunflower) seed oil, octyldodecyl myristate, argania spinosa (argan) kernel oil, moringa o

ernel oil, moringa oleifera seed oil, simmondsia chinensis (jojoba) seed oil, persea gratissima (avocado) oil, caprylic/capric triglyceride, rosmarinus officinalis (rosemary) leaf extract, laminaria saccharina extract, fucus vesiculosus (bladderwrack) extract, ascophyllum nodosum extract, crithmum maritimum extract, plankton extract, ascorbyl palmi

ract, ascorbyl palmitate

Directions: Push up tube. Gently apply to cheeks, forehead and chin to evenly distribute the product before massaging into skin. Can be used before the face cream, after or alone.

Warnings: Store at a temperature below 90 F. Avoid contact of the packaging with water. FOR EXTERNAL USE ONLY.
